sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe13
sys_update_xml.payload:
truecmsDislplays the login or logout portion of the CMS header. sport_cms_header_loginsys_ui_macroadmin_SHARE2014-04-22 13:06:24true23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe1351sport_cms_header_loginglobalfalseglobalsys_ui_macro_23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe13admin2016-05-11 12:32:39
var logoutAction = "logout.do"; var backtrack_path = ""; var tran = GlideTransaction.get(); if (tran.isVirtual()) { backtrack_path = "../"; logoutAction = backtrack_path + logoutAction; } var pageLink = new GlideCMSPageLink().getPageLink(current_page.getID()).substring(3); try { var documentKey = RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_document_key'); if (documentKey) pageLink += '?sysparm_document_key=' + documentKey; } catch(err) { } var pageLinkNotEncoded = pageLink; pageLink = GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(pageLink); var defaultPageLink = ""; var siteGR = new GlideRecord("content_site"); if (siteGR.get(current_page.getSiteID())) { var defaultPageId = siteGR.getValue("default_page"); if (defaultPageId) defaultPageLink = new GlideCMSPageLink().getPageLink(defaultPageId).substring(3); } defaultPageLink; var u = gs.getUser(); var f = user.getFirstName(); f;
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name} $[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
    • $[SP]My Profile
    • $[SP]${gs.getMessage('Logout')}
    • $[SP]Documentation
    • $[SP]Edit This Page
    • $[SP]Settings
    • $[SP]Release Notes
      •
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name}$[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name} $[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
    • $[SP]My Profile
    • $[SP]Documentation
    • $[SP]Edit This Page
    • $[SP]Settings
    • $[SP]Release Notes
      •
    • ]]>

sys_update_xml.name: content_css_ad71ff0b4d452d04bc95842eaf535497
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>sport.css</name><style>/*
Red #FF0000 (C62126)
Gray #BAC5C7
Black #000000
Yellow #FFF500
*/

.a-white:hover {
text-decoration: none;
font-weight: bold;
}

.search-img{
color: #fff;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar { 
    display: none; 
}

#gsftmain::-webkit-scrollbar { 
    display: none; 
}

li.dropdown{
  display: block !important;
}

/* Extra small devices (phones, less than 768px) */
/* No media query since this is the default in Bootstrap */

/* Small devices (tablets, 768px and up) */
@media (min-width: @screen-sm-min) {

}

/* Medium devices (desktops, 992px and up) */
@media (min-width: @screen-md-min) {

}

/* Large devices (large desktops, 1200px and up) */
@media (min-width: @screen-lg-min) {

}


/* general settings */
@font-face {
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    src: local('Open Sans'), local('OpenSans'), url(https://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/opensans/v8/cJZKeOuBrn4kERxqtaUH3bO3LdcAZYWl9Si6vvxL-qU.woff) format('woff');
}

BODY, TABLE, INPUT, SELECT, BUTTON, INPUT.TEXT, TEXTAREA, INPUT.button, label {
    font-size: 10pt;
    font-family:'Open Sans',Arial,sans-serif;
    color: #000;
}
/* iframe resize fix in IE10 */
body {
    height:auto;
}

iframe {
    /*
    padding-left: 5px;
    padding-right: 5px;
    */
}


HTML[data-doctype=true] A.btn-primary {
    color: #ffffff;
}
/*
.form-all, .form-all label, .form-all input, .form-all select, .form-all button, .form-all textarea {
   font-size: 10pt;
   font-family:'Open Sans',Arial,sans-serif,cursive !important;
}
*/

/* page editor - restore add content link  */
a[onclick="javascript:addHomeContent(this);"] {
    position: fixed;
    top: 75px;
    left: 30px;
    color: #FFF;
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* font-awesome */
.fa-black { color:#000; }

/* properties modal */
body > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tbody > tr
{
    display:none;
}
body > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) {
    display:none;
}

/* tooltips */
div.tooltip-inner, div.tooltip, .tooltip-top, .tooltip-in {
    background-color: #FFF500;
    color: #000;
}
.tooltip {
    background:#FFF500;
}
.tooltip-arrow {
    display: none;
}

/* properties page */
.prop-code {
    color: #c62126;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

/* login page */
#loginPage {
    border: 1px solid #C0C0C0;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 25px;
    width: 350px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}
#loginPage > table {
    border-spacing: 10px;
    border-collapse: separate;
}

/* layout elements */
div#sport_main div#dropzone30 {
/*    padding-top:20px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 20px; */
    padding-left: 10px;
}
#sport_main {
    margin-top:100px;
}
div#dropzone30 {
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    padding-right: 5px;
}
div#page_timing_div.timingDiv {
    display: none;
}
.row {
    margin-left: -9px;
    margin-right: -9px;
}


/* carousel */
.carousel {
    margin-bottom: 0px !important;
    width:1160px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}
div.item.active {
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
}
.carousel-chevron {
    margin-top: 300px;
}



/* header */
li.dropdown > a.dropdown-toggle {
    background-color: transparent;
    color: #FFF;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover, .dropdown-menu>li>a:focus {
    color: #000;
    background-color: #FFF500;
}
ul.dropdown-menu {
    text-transform: none;
}
.nav .open>a, .nav .open>a:hover, .nav .open>a:focus {
    background-color: transparent;
}
#sport-logo-center {
    position:fixed;
    left:50%;
    top:0px;
    margin-left:-48px;
    /* margin-top:-20px; */
    z-index:10000 !important;
}
ul.nav.navbar-nav.navbar-right {
    padding-top:15px;
}
form.navbar-form.navbar-right {
    padding:10px;
}
.navbar-wrapper {
    text-transform:uppercase;
    margin-top: 0px
}
.navbar-wrapper .navbar {
    border-radius: 0px;
}
.navbar-wrapper .navbar {
    border-radius: 0px !important;
}
#mini-cart {
    margin-top: 15px;
    margin-right: 15px;
    margin-left: 5px;
}
#mini-cart-count {
    position: absolute;
    margin-left: 13px;
    top: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
}
.navbar-brand {
    padding-top:7px !important;
}
.navbar>.container .navbar-brand, .navbar>.container-fluid .navbar-brand {
    margin-left: -10px;
}


/* footer */
#social_icons > a {
    margin-left: 5px;
}


/* header and footer */
div.navbar.navbar-inverse.navbar-fixed-bottom,div.navbar.navbar-inverse.navbar-fixed-top,.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .active > a {
    background-image: none;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
.navbar-text {
    color:#FFF !important;
}
ul.nav a {
    font-weight:bold;
}
ul.nav.navbar-nav > li > a {
    color: #fff;
}
div.cms_header_login_link {
    color:yellow;
    margin-right:15px;
}
.navbar-inverse {
    border: none;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-collapse,.navbar-inverse .navbar-form {
    border-color:#000;
}
.navbar-form {
    margin-bottom: 4px;
}
.nav > li > a {
    padding-left:10px;
}


/* page title */
.sport_page_title {
    padding-top: 0px;
}
.sport_page_title_text, .sport_page_description_text {
    display: block;
}
.sport_page_title_text {
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 210%;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sport_page_description_text {
    color: #BAC5C7;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}


/* search results */
div.searchlistresults a.content_list_link.content_kb_search, a.web.sclinked {
    font-size: 140%;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #1A0DAB;
    text-decoration: none;
}
div.searchlistresults a.content_list_link.content_kb_search:hover, a.web.sclinked:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}
a.searchtablelink {
    font-size: 200%;
    color: #C62126;
}
div.kb_add_info, a.kb_add_info_link {
    color:#006621;
}
a.kb_add_info_link, a.searchtablelink, a.noresultlink {
    pointer-events:none;
    cursor: default;
}
DIV.text_search_kb, TABLE.text_search_kb, DIV.text_search_catalog, TABLE.text_search_catalog {
    background-color: transparent;
}
DIV.cms_knowledge_link_subtext {
    display: none;
}
DIV.search_list_results_header {
    margin-top: 25px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}
div[id^='group_'] img[id^='img.ts'] {
    display: none;
}
span.searchfilterdisplay {
    margin-left: 20px;
}


/* output messages */
/*
DIV.outputmsg.outputmsg_info {
    background-color: #FFF500;
    border-radius: 2px;
    border: solid 1px #000;
}
*/
img.outputmsg_image {
    display: none;
}


/* new menu block section */
.sport_menu_block {
    padding: 10px;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.sport_menu_block_e {
    padding: 15px;
    text-align:left;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    min-height: 230px;
}
.sport_menu_block_category {
    font-size: 170%;
    margin-top: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color:#FFFFFF;
}
.a-white, .a-white:hover {
    color:#FFFFFF;
}
.a-white > i.fa {
   display:block;
}
.sport_menu_block_col_e {
    padding: 5px;
}
p.sport-menu-text-e {
    color:#FFFFFF;
}
.sport_menu_block a, .sport_menu_block label {
    color:#FFF;
    cursor: pointer;
    cursor: hand;
}
.sport_menu_block label {
    display: block;
}
.sport_menu_block hr {
    color:#FFF;
}
.sport_menu_block img {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}
.sport_menu_block_col {
    padding-left: 3px;
    padding-right: 3px;
}
.sport_menu_block_category {
    font-size: 170%;
    margin-top: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}
#sport_menu_block_links {
    margin-top: -10px;
    min-height: 200px;
}
#sport_menu_block_links a {
    color: #FFF;
}
a.sport_menu_block_item {
    display:block;
    font-size: 115%;
}
.sport_menu_block_top {
    padding:20px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
    min-height: 160px;
    text-align: center;
}
.sport_menu_block_top label:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
    text-decoration-color: #FFF;
}

/* feedback */
div.assessment_caption {
    display:none;
}


/* live feed */
#center_column {
    width: 80%;
}
h2.live_feed_name {
    color:#C62126;
}
img.live_feed_left_nav {
    display:none;
}
div.live_feed_left_nav {
    padding-left: 5px !important;
}
div.live_feed_left_nav_active {
    background-color: #FFCCCC !important;
    font-weight: 900;
    width: 150px;
}
table#window.live_feed_link_dialog.drag_section_picker td {
    background-color: #FFF;
}
div#live_feed_link_dialog table {
    background-color: #FFF;
}
div#live_feed_input_div input.upload_input_file, div.live_feed_left_avatar input.upload_input_file {
    top: 0;
    margin-left: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    cursor: hand;
}


/* accordion */
div.panel-body {
    color: #000;
}


/* task counter on todos */
div.noti_bubble {
    position:absolute;    /* This breaks the div from the normal HTML document. */
    top: 2px;
    right:-3px;
    color:black;
}

/* form elements */
select.form-control {
    width: inherit;
    display: inherit;
}

/* feedback CSS */
#feedback {
    height: 104px;
    width: 104px;
    position: fixed;
    top: 40%;
    z-index: 999;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(-90deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(-90deg);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
}

#feedback a {
    display: block;
    color: #000000;
    /*
    height: 15px;
    width: 70px;
    */
    padding: 8px 16px;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 17px;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-decoration: none;
    /*
    border-bottom: solid 1px #333;
    border-left: solid 1px #333;
    border-right: solid 1px #fff;
    */
}

#feedback a:hover {
    color: #ffffff;
}


/* form elements */
/*

  background-color: transparent;
  font-size: 100%;

  background-color: transparent !important;

  color: #C62126;

  background-color: #000;

  display:none;

  padding: 3px;

  font-weight: normal !important;

table#expert_banner {
  border-bottom: solid 1px silver;

  background-color: transparent;

  font-weight: normal;

  margin-right: 5px;

}

  font-size: 135%;
  color:#5a5a5a;
}
a.service_catalog > div  {
  color:#C62126;
}
div.sc_category_item, div.sc_category_item_hover {
  border: none;
}
div.sc_category_item_hover {

}

/* shopping cart */
/*
#body_cartContent {
  padding: 5px;
}

  border-radius: 2px;
  margin-top: 5px;
}
.sc_cart_window {
  border: none;
}
TD.sc_cart_cell {
  padding: 5px;
}
*/


/* buttons */
/*
button, input[type="button"], input[type="submit"], .request_catalog_button, .graphic_button, button.catalog, button.catalog_search, .form_action_button, button#sysverb_new, button#update_work_button,
.request_catalog_button:hover, .graphic_button:hover, button.catalog:hover, button.catalog_search:hover, .form_action_button:hover,button#update_work_button:hover
 {
  margin-right:3px;

{
  color:#FFF !important;
}
button:hover, input[type="button"]:hover, input[type="submit"]:hover, .request_catalog_button:hover, .graphic_button:hover, button.catalog:hover, button.catalog_search:hover, .form_action_button:hover,button#update_work_button:hover
{
  color: #000 !important;
  border: solid 1px #000;
}
button.header {
  border: solid 1px #C62126;
}
A.request_catalog_button, BUTTON.request_catalog {
  font-weight: normal;
}
img#sysverb_back {
  display: none;
}
div.catalog_button_container {
  margin-top: 10px;
}
button.catalog {
  margin-top: 5px;
}
td.order_buttons > a > img, a.request_catalog_button > img {
  display:none;
}

/* arrows */
/*
.arrow-container {
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  display: flex;
  margin-left: 8px;
}
.arrow-black, .arrow-red {
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  border-top: 10px solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 10px solid transparent;
  margin-left: 2px;
}

  border-left: 30px solid #000;
}
.arrow-red {
  border-left: 30px solid #C62126;
}
*/

/* news ticker */
.glyphicon
{
    margin-right:4px !important; /*override*/
}

.pagination .glyphicon
{
    margin-right:0px !important; /*override*/
}

.pagination a
{
    color:#555;
}

.panel ul
{
    padding:0px;
    margin:0px;
    list-style:none;
}
.panel-default {
    border:none;
}
.panel-body {
    padding-bottom: 0px;
    padding-top: 0px;
}
.panel-footer {
    border: none;
    background-color: inherit;
}
.panel-default>.panel-heading {
    color: #005aa8;
    background-color: transparent;
    border:none;
}
.panel-heading {
    border:none;
    border-top-right-radius: 0px;
    border-top-left-radius: 0px;
    font-size: 150%;
}
div.panel-heading > span.glyphicon.glyphicon-list-alt {
    display: none;
}

.news-item
{
    padding:4px 4px;
    padding-left: 0px;
    margin:0px;
    /* border-bottom:1px dotted #555; */
}
.basic-list {
    list-style: none;
}

/* language selector */
span#language {
    display: inline-block !important;
    visibility: visible !important;
    margin-right: 15px;
}
label[for="language_select"] {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>eric.szonyi_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-06-06 19:26:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ad71ff0b4d452d04bc95842eaf535497</sys_id><sys_mod_count>244</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sport.css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_ad71ff0b4d452d04bc95842eaf535497</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-11 20:02:00</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>
